H0.text: What major river flows through Paris. Rhone

H1.text: What major river flows through Paris. Loire

H2.text: What major river flows through Paris. Danube

H3.text: What major river flows through Paris. Seine

A4.text: It rises at Source-Seine, 30 kilometres (19 mi) northwest of Dijon in northeastern France in the Langres plateau, flowing through Paris and into the English Channel at Le Havre (and Honfleur on the left bank).

A5.text: The Seine is a 777-kilometre-long river in northern France.
